Portfolio

C#

Mobile Shop Management System

  • A small project built with Winform C# and SQL Server for database
  • Managing goods, customer and employee information easily thanks to the simple, clean UI.
  • Can adjust user permission for each account based on employee's role
  • Can view revenue statistics by month and year
  • Contributors: 4

Python

Hex-game

  • Hex is two player strategy board game played on a hexagonal grid, theoretically of any size and several possible shapes. Each player is assigned a pair of opposite sides of the board, which they must try to connect by alternately placing a stone of their color onto any empty hex. Once placed, the stones are never moved or removed. A player wins when they successfully connect their sides together through a chain of adjacent stones(Wikipedia)
  • Made with pygame library with a simple UI, enough to meet the basic requirements of gameplay
  • Support playing on 8x8 to 14x14 rhombus board
  • Contributors: 1
